oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Poplar Plaza Demolition
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Poplar Plaza; Poplar Avenue; commercial properties; shopping; construction; grocery stores; demolition; 2010s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Demolition on a building on the west side of Poplar Plaza (along Prescott). Most recently home to Tasty Buffet, the site will next be home to an expanded Kroger.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McCloy, Keenon
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: 2012 demolition of Poplar Plaza Tastee Buffet bldg (82)
